Definition: Specialist Examination
A
specialist examination
is any examination that is conducted by a clinician who specializes in a particular field.
Notes
:
All vision, hearing, dental, and psychiatric examinations
must
be conducted by a specialist.
In unusual cases, or as requested by a BVA remand, it may be necessary to request a specialist examination for other types of disabilities.
